name: Sohva
body:
Gnieh Sohva
===========

Gnieh Sohva is a set of scala libraries allowing users to easily store and retrieve data from [couchdb](http://couchdb.apache.org/) databases.

It consists in several tools:
 - `sohva-client` is a client allowing user to query a CouchDB server,
 - `sohva-entities` is a small framework allowing to manage [entity/component systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Entity_component_system) stored in a CouchDB database,
 - `sohva-testing` is a module that allows to test applications that use CouchDB.

Have a look at the [wiki pages](https://github.com/gnieh/sohva/wiki) for more documentation
